featured.text: What does “a new chapter” in line 2, paragraph 1 mean? (A) A new unit of a book.
When I open a book, I look first at the table of to get a general idea of the book and to see which chapters I might be interested in reading.

definition.zh_def: 書籍或文獻中的一部分，通常包含一個主題或故事的特定段落。
definition.en_def: A section of a book or document, typically dealing with a specific theme or part of a story.
definition.example: She read the first chapter of the novel before going to bed.
